articles.author: Asian Aviation
articles.title: Airbus tipped to build space weather spacecraft Vigil - Asian Aviation
articles.description: Airbus has been selected by the European Space Agency (ESA) to design and build the space weather forecasting satellite Vigil
articles.content: Airbus has been selected by the European Space Agency (ESA) to design and build the space weather forecasting satellite Vigil, the first operational mission in ESAs Space Situational Awareness (SSA) … [+4103 chars]
